Verses: 1 en Kaigalaip Porukkum En Viralgalai Yuththaththirkum Padippikkira En Kanmalaiyaagiya Karththarukku Sthoththiram.
2 avar En Dhayaabararum, En Kottaiyum, En Uyarndha Adaikkalamum, Ennai Viduvikkiravarum, En Kedagamum, Naan Nambinavarum, En Janangalai Enakkuk Keezhppaduththugiravarumaayirukkiraar.
3 karththaave, Manushanai Neer Gavanikkiradharkum, Manupuththiranai Neer Ennugiradharkum, Avan Emmaaththiram?
4 manushan Maayaikku Oppaayirukkiraan; Avan Naatkal Kadandhupogira Nizhalukkuch Samaanam.
5 karththaave, Neer Umadhu Vaanangalaith Thaazhththi Irangi, Parvadhangal Pugaiyumpadi Avaigalaith Thodum.
6 minnalgalai Varavittuch Saththurukkalaich Sidharadiyum, Umadhu Ambugalai Eydhu Avargalaik Kalangadiyum.
7 uyaraththilirundhu Umadhu Karaththai Neetti, Jalappiravaagaththukku Ennai Vilakki Ratchiyum.
8 maayaiyaip Pesum Vaayum, Kallaththanamaana Valadhukaiyum Udaiya Anniya Puththirarin Kaikku Ennai Vilakkith Thappuviyum.
9 karththaave, Naan Umakkup Pudhuppaattaip Paaduven; Thamburinaalum Paththunarambu Veenaiyinaalum Ummaik Keerththanampannuven.
10 neere Raajaakkalukku Jeyaththaith Thandhu, Umadhadiyaanaagiya Thaaveedhaip Pollaadha Pattayaththirkuth Thappuvikkiravar.
11 maayaiyaip Pesum Vaayum, Kallaththanamaana Valadhukaiyum Udaiya Anniya Puththirarin Kaikku Ennai Vilakkith Thappuviyum.
12 appozhudhu Engal Kumaarar Ilamaiyil Ongivalarugira Virutchakkandrugalaippolavum, Engal Kumaaraththigal Siththirantheerndha Aramanai Moolaikkarkalaippolavum Iruppaargal.
13 engal Kalanjiyangal Sagalavidha Vasthukkalaiyum Kodukkaththakkadhaai Nirambiyirukkum; Engal Giraamangalil Engal Aadukal Aayiram Padhinaayiramaaip Palugum.
14 engal Erudhugal Balaththavaigalaayirukkum; Saththuru Utpugudhalum Kudiyodippogudhalum Iraadhu; Engal Veedhigalil Kookkuralum Undaagaadhu.
15 ivvidhamaana Seeraippetrajanam Baakkiyamulladhu; Karththaraith Dheyvamaagak Kondirukkira Janam Baakkiyamulladhu.
